attributes.action: Stop installing tracing apps onto people’s mobile phones without their consent.
attributes.additional_details: So it paves the way for future populations of the U.K. civil liberties to not be undermined and abused.
attributes.background:
Regarding the article I read below, I want this procedure to be ended.  It is an infiltration of people’s civil liberties and totally unacceptable.  I do not consent. 
https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/news/uk-news/coronavirus-tracker-now-your-phone-18457384

rejection.details:
Tracing apps are not being installed on peoples' phones without their permission.

Android and Apple phones have had their systems updated so that, if a user downloads an official app from a public health authority, this can share info to help alert you and other users of exposure to Covid-19.

You can find out more about these software updates here:

Android: https://support.google.com/android/answer/9888358?hl=en-GB
Apple: https://covid19.apple.com/contacttracing
